casebody.data:
Second Department,

March, 1954.

(March 1, 1954.) Katherine Madden, Respondent, v. Federated Department Stores, Inc. (Bloomingdale Bros. Division), as Successor to Bloomingdale Bros. Inc., Appellant.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Appellate Division denied, without costs. Present — Nolan, P. J., Adel, MacCrate and Beldoek, JJ.; Murphy, J., not voting.
